name: Blockchain Cuties Universe Governance
description: BCUG is the native governance and utility token of Blockchain Cuties Universe game that is going to be used for: * Transactional operations – in-game currency for majority of existing mechanics and exclusive goods * Liquidity Providing * Gameplay farming – ability to earn tokens by performing meaningful actions within the game (true Play2Earn) * Staking and NFT based governance * Staking to mine two derivative tokens (Hero token and Political Power Token)
